title: No Way I'd Love You, Dickhead!
alternative_title: Horete Tamaruka, Kusottare! ; No Way I'd Love You, Dickhead! ; No Way I'd Love You, Shithead! ; 惚れてたまるか、クソったれ！
status: Horete Tamaruka, Kusottare! ; No Way I'd Love You, Dickhead! ; No Way I'd Love You, Shithead! ; 惚れてたまるか、クソったれ！
description:
Description :
        After one night in heaven with the "Virgin Killer," this subordinate has been unable to complete the "task," and has no clue why. It's been 10 years since his first time and 10 years with limp di**! When he starts a new job, he runs into the "Virgin Killer" for the first time since their encounter. Venting about his pent-up emotions and erectile issues leaves him open to being teased by Hizaki. "If it's something you can do, do it, limp di**!" and he is challenged to test his problem. Will nights get even hotter than that night 10 years ago?! It's a love battle royale between a straightforward subordinate and a beautiful boss with a bad personality.
